transit_routes.name: Tender to Island
transit_routes.note: Ships typically tender to island. Short boat ride from ship.

transit_routes.name: Island Walkways
transit_routes.note: Entire island walkable. Tram service available for mobility needs.

featured_experiences.name: Thrill Waterpark
featured_experiences.note: Additional fee but worth it. Book in cruise planner ahead.

featured_experiences.note: Included with cruise. Arrive early for best lounger spots.

featured_experiences.name: Up, Up and Away Balloon
featured_experiences.note: Tethered helium balloon. Additional fee. Stunning photos.
